member.name: MFTOPOLOGY_HARDWARE_MODE
member.summary: Specifies whether the topology loader will insert hardware-based Media Foundation transforms (MFTs) into the topology.

member.name: MFTOPOLOGY_HARDWARE_MODE.MFTOPOLOGY_HWMODE_SOFTWARE_ONLY
member.summary: Use only software MFTs. Do not use hardware-based MFTs. This mode is the default, for backward compatibility with existing applications.

member.name: MFTOPOLOGY_HARDWARE_MODE.MFTOPOLOGY_HWMODE_USE_HARDWARE
member.summary: Use hardware-based MFTs when possible, and software MFTs otherwise. This mode is the recommended one.

summary.para: If hardware-based MFTs are available, the topoloader will insert them. If not, the connection will fail.
